cast.name: 沃拉纳·拉塔纳帕斯 Dome Woranart Ratthanaphast
纳塔彭·帕松 Benz Natthapong Pathong
帕萨维特·沙威特瑞缇库 Pasawit Savetrittikun
帕岚尤·苏克萨姆兰 Prarunyu Sooksamram
坦恩.基缇男.坎蒙功空理法密昕 Tann Kittinan Karnmongkolvamich
皮亚瓦·彭卡尼塔浓 Piyawat Phongkanitanon

writer.name: 弗恩·塔尼亚托恩·布蒂 Fern Tanyatorn Butyee

introduction: 由三个不同小说故事组成，讲述关于爱的不同观点的三个不同故事【诱惑理论】一个叫孔波德的学生和他即将毕业的大四学生拉哈特一见钟情。他试图说服他不要永远失去他。许多障碍等待着，将能为他对拉哈特的爱而战？【命运理论】塔万相信命运。一天，他在书店遇到一个害羞的家伙Meth。几 天过去了，他在不同的地方见过他三次场景。当这两个人不再是陌生人时会发生什么？【二分之一理论】 对于阿泰来说，幸福在于做自己。如果他找不到能适应他的人，还是一个人好。如果他找到了他的另一半普拉布会怎么样？Three different stories about different opinions about love.1) A student named Konpord fall in love at first sight with his graduating senior, Rahat. And he tries to woo him not to lose him forever. Many obstacles await, will be able to fight his love for Rahat?2) Tawan believes in destiny. One day, he meets a shy guy, Meth at the bookstore. Days passed by, he met him thrice in different scenarios. What will happen when these two men are no longer a stranger?3) For Thai, happiness lies within being himself. If he can’t find someone who can adapts for him, it’s better to be alone. What will happen if he found Prab, his other half?
